metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Uses songs and relatable situations to teach social-emotional skills, similar to Bluey's positive life lessons.

metas.name: The Magic School Bus Rides Again
metas.description: An educational animated series with fun characters that will fuel curiosity and teach about science, similar to Curious George.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: A kind bear experiences new things with a loving family, just like Bluey but with a gentler pace.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: Deals with everyday childhood challenges and teaches about friendship and empathy through engaging stories.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A classic educational show that uses puppets, songs, and skits to teach letters, numbers, and important life lessons, providing engaging content for younger viewers.
